name: Prostitute Simulator 2
description:
Welcome to the second entry of the best prostitute simulator. In this game you will be able to give free rein to your hottest desires.
Work as a prostitute, get clients and enjoy amazing high quality porn scenes.

Choose your favorite mode: Anime or realistic (All adult content is created with stylized 3D models.)

Experience firsthand a deep story, where you will know the motivations and desires of the protagonists.



⚫︎Modo censorship for streamers. With this mode you can play the game live or upload videos to Youtube without worrying about watching any adult content.

⚫︎ Beware! Prostitution is illegal in some countries, so the police are on the prowl - don't let them catch you or it's game over!

⚫︎ Improve your sexual performance with different mini-games to get extra money while experiencing mayhem in three different cities around the world thanks to a random event system.

⚫︎ An exciting story that will take you around the world for 30 days with the prostitute of your choice.

⚫︎ Travel to three cities around the world: Japan, Middle East and Brazil.

⚫︎ Random events cause chaos in the cities so that every day is different.

⚫︎ Earn extra money as a photographer by selling the pictures you have taken around the cities.

⚫︎ Use the money you earn to unlock porn scenes in the gallery.
